synopsis: Reviews are largely positive about this lightweight, easy-to-blend serum foundation that gives a natural, glowy finish and feels comfortable for everyday use. Many cite good value and smooth application, though coverage is generally light and some feel it behaves more like a tint. Critiques note inconsistent longevity/transfer resistance, shade mismatches or oxidation, small-feeling quantity, and occasional issues with the dropper or runny texture.
key_takeaways: Lightweight, serum-like texture that blends easily with a smooth, natural finish
Coverage skews light; enhances complexion rather than fully masking imperfections
Wear time feedback varies; not consistently transfer- or water-resistant
Shade matching and perceived quantity draw complaints, with occasional dropper issues
